greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: Sum_{n>=0} x^n/(1 + x^n)^n.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (terms 0..1000 from Paul D. Hanna)
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} (-1)^(d-1) * binomial(d+n/d-2, d-1) for n > 0.
mathematica: terms = 100; Sum[x^n/(1 + x^n)^n, {n, 0, terms}] + O[x]^terms // CoefficientList[#, x]& (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 16 2017 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = if(n==0, 1, sumdiv(n, d, (-1)^(d-1)*binomial(d+n/d-2, d-1))); \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Apr 23 2021
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 10 2012
